column7: Probably the best cinnamon buns in Sweden!
column9:
Popular cafe at Lunds stadsbibliotek (library) friendly service and good homemade food. 
Wonderful terrace in the sunny courtyard where you can sit and relax.
The cinnamon buns are probably the best in Sweden according to my wife (and she's an expert).
I am simply in love with their food, but my favourite is their cinnamon buns.... don't think any other café sells them at such a size and for a reasonable price as well. I love it.

Everything is homemade, which is becoming rare these days. Scrumptious food served by a super friendly staff. If you are in luck there will be alfajores: Argentinian treats made with two soft and crumbly cookies sandwiched around a luscious dollop of dulce de leche. They...More
we had a tip-off from a local that the cinnamon buns were good here and they were!! café at local library. chilled vibe, wi-fi, newspapers and delicious cakes/friendly service. hunt it out!
Martas cafe ligger på stadsbiblioteket. Inte speciellt charmigt och lite slitet men oftast välbesökt och deras kanelbullar med en cappuccino...More

column7: Förmodligen den bästa kanelbullar i Sverige!
column9:
Populära kafé på Lunds stadsbibliotek (bibliotek) vänlig service och bra hemlagad mat.
Underbar terrass i den soliga innergården där du...More
Jag är helt förälskad i deras mat, men favoriten är deras kanelbullar .... tror inte att något annat café säljer...More

column7: Café på samma nivå som Stadsbiblioteket!
column9: När Du hämtat dina beställda böcker, försjunkit i de utländska tidningarna, noterat de för dig nya uttrycken i din anteckningsbok...More
